isis.stitle: ELECTRONIC ENGINE CONTROLS - CUMMINS PT PACER - 1992 - 1993 - SERVICE TOOLS - Service Procedure

svcproc.title: Service Procedure
svcproc.para: PT Pacer equipped vehicles have a male data link connector for the Compulink and a female diagnostic connector for use with a PT Pacer Fault Code Monitor.

The Compulink is used to program owner specified information into the PCU, monitor the system, and assist in troubleshooting. The Compulink may be available at Cummins Authorized Service Centers. Replacement 8-way data link connector cables (Cummins part number 3615693) for the Compulink can be ordered from a Cummins dealer.
The hand-held, PT Pacer Fault Code Monitor has a light that will flash out the active electronic fault codes. The Monitor is Cummins part number 3823613, and can be ordered from Cummins Dealers.

note.para: On the Cummins Compulink, since no alpha characters are available, use the up-arrow and down-arrow to move through the alphabet.
